Title: Nothing Left to Do but Cry

Actors: Massimo Troisi, Roberto Benigni, Iris Peynado, Amanda Sandrelli
Plot: A teacher (Saverio) and a schoolkeeper (Mario) get lost in the Italian countryside. They find themselves in the late 15th century, they met Leonardo da Vinci and try to teach him how to ...
